Text: Thanks for the torrent -- I'm an owl who's up most of the night while my husband has to get up early.  I rely heavily on subtitles or CC in English so I can keep the volume down fairly low.  It's so hard to find torrents with English subs, so I really appreciate it!  Now if only some of those leechers would seed.  Right now I'm not getting anything at all. :(
No subs here... and the audio sounds a bit weak... I think I'll try another torrent to compare with.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6466725/Stonehenge.Apocalypse.2010.480p.BRRip.XviD.AC3-NYDIC seems to have better sound. (Haven't watched all of it, so no promises.) Still no subs though.
